about_the_game:
Have you had the urge to grab a motorcycle and just go? What would you say about a great road trip across the States? Only you, your faithful bike, beautiful landscapes and the magnificent roar of the engine. And all the people you meet and their stories to tell.

Remember to take care of your machine as it can break down just like in real life. Should it happen to you, you can try fixing it on the road or get it to the nearest mechanic shop. Don’t forget to fuel it, and add personality to make it your own.

Travel across the USA, explore the different parts of particular States, and enjoy the breathtaking views! Are you ready for the adventure?

FEATURES:


  • Plan a road trip across the United States
  • Explore environments unique to different States
  • Take care of your motorcycle
  • Take part in many challenges
  • Meet NPCs with unique stories

  • OS *: Windows(64-bit) 7 or Newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM

short_description: Have you ever wanted to drop everything and go on a journey across the United States? Do it now in American Motorcycle Simulator! Grab your motorbike and taste freedom driving across different parts of the USA.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Polish, Russian, Turkish, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil
*languages with full audio support
